import React from 'react' import { Navbar,Nav,Container,Row, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state=>state.userLogin) const {userInfo} = userLogin return (
TechStop
Cart {userInfo?( Profile Logout ):( Login )}
) } export default Header
